title: God Fist Tournament - 1v1 Lee Sin

embed.description: ​QueenslandLoL, Sumoners Society, League of legends NZ, and WA League of Legends are proud to present the God Fist Tournament to celebrate the release of the God Fist Lee Sin skin. Are you the best 'Lee Sin' on the server?! Well it's your chance to prove it!

body:
​QueenslandLoL, Sumoners Society, League of legends NZ, and WA League of Legends are proud to present the God Fist Tournament to celebrate the release of the God Fist Lee Sin skin.

Are you the best 'Lee Sin' on the server?! Well it's your chance to prove it!

Tournament: Lee Sin only 1 v 1

Date: 8/04/2017 - 9/04/2017
Start Time: 12:00 pm (Sydney time)
Finish Time: 7:00 pm (Sydney time)
Check in starts: 11:30 am (Sydney time)
Check in closes: 12:00 pm (Sydney time)

Sign up link: https://battlefy.com/summonerssociety/god-fist-tournament-1v1-lee-sin/58e0ed37ed27603f03298da6/info

Discord: https://discord.gg/qEyEfyE

Stream: twitch.tv/summonerssociety

Bracket information:
Elimination type: Double
Finals: BO5 (The last two finalist) ​

Rules:
Must own Lee Sin
Adhere to the Summoners code


How to win:
100 cs
or
First Kill
or
1st tower
Please take a screen cap for proof of results, just in case of dispute. (If a dispute occurs and no screen cap is provided, a rematch will happen.)

Prizing:
1st place - God Fist Lee Sin
2nd place - Fist summoner icon + 1 chest and key (hextech)
All participants get 4 win IP boost (including first and second)

The communities behind the touarment!

QLD League of Legends (QLDLOL)
https://www.facebook.com/groups/LeagueofLegendsQLD/

Sumomers Society (SumSoc)
https://www.facebook.com/groups/SummonersSocietyOC...​

League of legends NZ (LOLnz)
https://www.facebook.com/groups/lolnz/

Western Australia Lol
https://www.facebook.com/groups/LeagueWA/


{{champion:64}} {{item:3649}}  {{summoner:4}}

replies.body: This looks fun! Too bad I'm no good at Lee Sin >.<
